timeline.bodyText: why does this not use unregisterChannel?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: because the AuthenticatedChannelServerDriver owns calling unregisterChannel. We assume, correctly, that there is no channel registered here that doesn't have an associated driver. This switch made handling of closing much simpler.
